name: Entity (itch) (Robot Fuzz!)
description:
Welcome, Entity. You're here to stop the Security Intelligence Network, or as it likes to be called. S.I.N

Entity is a shooter where you only get one life, so everything matters. This is a semi-remake of one of my old games Entity. This game has most of the same gameplay (with some changes) but a totally new story and characters.

Sounds - https://pastebin.com/ecP9M9n0

Music by Josh Whelchel

MUSIC AND SOUNDS ARE NOT FINAL
